blog.name: thedailyhs
blog.title: TheDailyHS
blog.description: Welcome to TheDailyHS, a blog dedicated to the singer, songwriter and newly found actor; Harry Styles. You might find photos, videos and updates here!

summary: Met Costume Institute Embraces ‘Camp’ for 2019 Blockbuster Show
body:
Met Costume Institute Embraces ‘Camp’ for 2019 Blockbuster Show

The show is to be unveiled at the annual gala party on May 6 co-chaired by Anna Wintour (who is herself something of a camp icon), editor of Vogue and artistic director of Condé Nast (which is also supporting the show); Lady Gaga, the superstar whose personal presentation and career are practically an ode to the transformative power of camp; Mr. Michele; the pop singer Harry Styles (a star of a current Gucci ad campaign); and the tennis star Serena Williams.

title: Gorgeous
body:
-the one inspired from Gorgeous

Master List

Before You Read: Y/N is famous herself, huge age difference (I didn’t mention their age so you can pretend Y/N’s age whatever but she’s legal), I changed the lyric from Ocean blue eyes to forest green eye - just so it makes sense!

A/N: I have so many request rn but I decided to write something that popped in my mind few days ago. But, I promise I’ll get back to each and everyone who sent in requests and promise I’m not ignoring you guys! Plus as it is inspired by Taylor Swifts’s Gorgeous, I’d recommend you to listen to it while reading it.

The air was filled with the smell of campaign and expensive fragrance. The room was decorated with elegant jewelleries and ornaments. People were dancing and drinking with their friends and their partners. But, Y/N stood there alone, with her own glass of Champaign, wearing an expensive short dress of her own; illuminated under the chandelier above her. Her gaze was fixed at a particular man standing at the far corner of the room talking to few of his friends.

Y/N didn’t know how long she was standing there, looking at him. However, the time she spotted him - she wasn’t tipsy and her elbows and shoulder didn’t hurt for leaning on the bar counter for so long.

Harry, he was so gorgeous. His forest green eyes, his sizzled cheek bones, his defined jaw, his fluffy hair - he was just so gorgeous.

Suddenly, he looked on his left and his eyes fell on her. That was the third time that night she was caught staring. But, that didn’t make her get used to his soft yet stern; light yet steely gaze, nor did it make her look away from him. Y/N waved with confidence, a smile fixed on her face but her knees- they were going weak and her heart- it was beating thousand miles a minute.

Harry waved back just like he did last two times before going back to his conversation. Even from this far Y/N could tell he was confused and even from this far she sensed the little excitement and happiness, he exerted after that.

“You like him.”

A sudden voice snapped Y/N out of her thoughts. Y/N looked on her side. It was Mia, her best friend and her colleague. However, she wasn’t looking at her, she was looking at the man Y/N was looking at

“Huh?” Y/N asked trying to act confused.

“Harry, you’ve been looking at him non-stop from the past hour,” she said as she turned around leaning her front on the bar counter, Y/N followed suit.

You should take it as a compliment

That I got drunk and made fun of the way you talk

“I don’t like him! I just think he talks in a funny way,” Y/N replied as she put a hand on her upper abdomen and moved her other hand in the air in attempt of copying him.

“Whatever you say, but remember he’s older than you, a lot older than you” Mia said in a sing song voice before walking away to her boyfriend who was waving at her.

“I talk like that?” A very familiar yet foreign voice spoke from behind, startling Y/N.

“Oh, jeez, you scared me,” Y/N said putting a hand on her chest but looking away from him, nonetheless. Seeing him from far made her heart beat like it’s in a marathon and having him just few inches away from her, she felt her heart was going to beat out of her chest as her palms got sweaty, her mind fuzzy while she felt her face heat up.

You’re so gorgeous I can’t say anything to your face

‘Cause look at your face

“I talk like that?” Harry said again before ordering a drink for himself.

“Um, yeah uh - a little,” Y/N stuttered looking at Harry for a brief second and looked down again. “But, I didn’t mean it that way, I was just I don’t know.”

You should think about the consequence

Of your magnetic field being a little too strong

Y/N looked up again. He was looking at her with an amused look on his face as his eyes sparkled under the dim light. Y/N, however she just wanted to run away from him and get into the safety of her house or the bathroom of the house she was in currently, but she couldn’t. She felt like he was pulling her like a magnet and staying even two inches away from him was hard for her.

“Don’t worry people tell me that all the time,” Harry hadn’t torn his gaze away from her at all. And Y/N could tell he was enjoying seeing Y/N getting all worked up under his gaze.

“You shouldn’t change it though,” Y/N looked away taking a sip from her wine. “I think it’s adorable.”

Her head snapped at Harry’s direction. Her eyes went wide as she clasped her hand on her mouth realizing what she just said making Harry chuckle out loud. “Oh God, I didn’t mean it like that. I shouldn’t have said that.”

He was her senior - by age, by career -was she fucking stupid!

“Then what you meant?” Harry laughed.

Forest Green eyes looking in mine

I feel like I might sink and drown and die

“Uh, I, um-” Harry raised his eyebrows at Y/N making her quickly look away again. Y/N could never maintain an eye contact with him more than two minutes; looking at his green orbs just made her feel she would sink, drown and eventually die in them.

And you should think about the consequence

Of you touching my hand in a darkened room

“I don’t know,” Y/N quickly replied as she played with the glass in her hand filled with Champaign. Harry hummed next to her. Before they could say anything else and before Y/N could get any more nervous the lights went out as the countdown started for the new year.

“10.”

“9.”

“8.”

“7.”

“6.”

“5.”

Electricity ran through Y/N’s vein as she felt a hand brush hers ever so lightly.

“4.”

Y/N looked down, even in the dark Y/N could make out Harry’s tattooed hand and his ringed fingers.

“3.”

“’m sorry,” Harry said his voice was almost like a whisper against the loud counting.

“2.”

“It’s fine,” Y/N replied looking up. Harry, he was almost towering over her. It was dark, no doubt but even in it Y/N could make the outlines of his face and Y/N could see the light glinting almost like a star in his eyes.

“1.”

Y/N didn’t know what happened -maybe it was the Champaign in her system- but it felt as if her hand made its way up to Harry’s cheek on it’s own and pressed itself lightly against him. Y/N was about to kiss him but the lights came back on as she returned to her senses and hurriedly took her hand away from him.

“Happy New Year!” Everyone yelled.

“Happy New Year,” Harry whispered to Y/N as a smirk played on his lips.

Y/N didn’t reply she was just so embarrassed, she couldn’t even look at him even for a brief second. Harry however hadn’t tore his gaze from her. Even when he was greeting people for new year just like Y/N was, he had his gaze fixed on her, making Y/N even more nervous.

For the next ten minutes it was nothing but loud chattering as they could see the fireworks from the huge window that covered one entire wall of the room.

“I think I’ll head home,” Y/N didn’t want to talk to Harry at all -she was too embarrassed for that- but she was about to leave and leaving without a good bye when he was standing next to her just seemed rude.

“Why? Party just started,” Harry replied.

Y/N didn’t know why she wanted to leave, or maybe she did. Y/N just wanted get away from him and just tell herself how stupid she acted while eating ice cream and re-watching some show on Netflix.

He was older, why he’d want to be with a teenager, such as herself. Why would Y/N even think of making a move when it was clearly not possible for them.

Y/ N just wanted to go home.

“I’m not feeling like partying right now.”

Harry chuckled. “I’ll drop you off then.”

“There’s no need,” Y/N quickly said shaking her head. She wanted to get away from him, she obviously didn’t want be alone with him in a car for almost an hour. But there was a part of her which was excited and which just wanted to be alone with him and spend time with him.

“Oh, c'mon, You had too many drinks, you don’t want to spend the first day of new year in jail, now do you?”

“Uh, you had drinks yourself,” Y/N tried to reason.

“One glass can drive,” stated as he tugged on Y/N’s arm to so she’d move.

“Bu-” Y/N tried to protest but Harry cut her.

“No buts,” Harry said pulling her.

“Fine,” Y/N said giving in. It was probably that part of her which just wanted to be with him, that made her give in so easily.

*

The whole car ride was light hearted. Harry made small talks - asking her about her family, congratulating her on her new film, cracking a joke every now and then as different songs played softly from the radio.

Y/N felt comfortable. Even though she had butterflies in her stomach and her heart was still racing, she wasn’t nervous anymore. Y/N almost felt she knew him her whole life, even though she knew it was their first time having a decent conversation. But, Harry, he made her feel home, somehow.

Guess I’ll just stumble on home to my cats

Alone, unless you wanna come along

“Gonna sleep now?” Harry asked as he parked his car in Y/N’s front lawn.

“Um no, probably gonna cuddle my cats and watch TV,” Y/N paused before she said timidly. “Unless you wanna come along.”

“Sure,” Harry’s face broke into a huge grin. It was as if he was almost waiting for Y/N to say those words.

Harry turned off his car’s ignition before Y/N guided him to her house. The rest of the night they watched ‘Legally Blonde’ while snuggling each other with five of Y/N’s cats and eventually falling asleep on each other by morning.

That night was the night when Y/N found her love.

Harry waved back just like he did last two times before going back to his conversation. Even from this far Y/N could tell he was confused and even from this far she sensed the little excitement and happiness, he exerted after that.

“You like him.”

A sudden voice snapped Y/N out of her thoughts. Y/N looked on her side. It was Mia, her best friend and her colleague. However, she wasn’t looking at her, she was looking at the man Y/N was looking at

“Huh?” Y/N asked trying to act confused.

“Harry, you’ve been looking at him non-stop from the past hour,” she said as she turned around leaning her front on the bar counter, Y/N followed suit.

You should take it as a compliment

That I got drunk and made fun of the way you talk

“I don’t like him! I just think he talks in a funny way,” Y/N replied as she put a hand on her upper abdomen and moved her other hand in the air in attempt of copying him.

“Whatever you say, but remember he’s older than you, a lot older than you” Mia said in a sing song voice before walking away to her boyfriend who was waving at her.

“I talk like that?” A very familiar yet foreign voice spoke from behind, startling Y/N.

“Oh, jeez, you scared me,” Y/N said putting a hand on her chest but looking away from him, nonetheless. Seeing him from far made her heart beat like it’s in a marathon and having him just few inches away from her, she felt her heart was going to beat out of her chest as her palms got sweaty, her mind fuzzy while she felt her face heat up.

You’re so gorgeous I can’t say anything to your face

‘Cause look at your face

“I talk like that?” Harry said again before ordering a drink for himself.

“Um, yeah uh - a little,” Y/N stuttered looking at Harry for a brief second and looked down again. “But, I didn’t mean it that way, I was just I don’t know.”

You should think about the consequence

Of your magnetic field being a little too strong

Y/N looked up again. He was looking at her with an amused look on his face as his eyes sparkled under the dim light. Y/N, however she just wanted to run away from him and get into the safety of her house or the bathroom of the house she was in currently, but she couldn’t. She felt like he was pulling her like a magnet and staying even two inches away from him was hard for her.

“Don’t worry people tell me that all the time,” Harry hadn’t torn his gaze away from her at all. And Y/N could tell he was enjoying seeing Y/N getting all worked up under his gaze.

“You shouldn’t change it though,” Y/N looked away taking a sip from her wine. “I think it’s adorable.”

Her head snapped at Harry’s direction. Her eyes went wide as she clasped her hand on her mouth realizing what she just said making Harry chuckle out loud. “Oh God, I didn’t mean it like that. I shouldn’t have said that.”

He was her senior - by age, by career -was she fucking stupid!

“Then what you meant?” Harry laughed.

Forest Green eyes looking in mine

I feel like I might sink and drown and die

“Uh, I, um-” Harry raised his eyebrows at Y/N making her quickly look away again. Y/N could never maintain an eye contact with him more than two minutes; looking at his green orbs just made her feel she would sink, drown and eventually die in them.

And you should think about the consequence

Of you touching my hand in a darkened room

“I don’t know,” Y/N quickly replied as she played with the glass in her hand filled with Champaign. Harry hummed next to her. Before they could say anything else and before Y/N could get any more nervous the lights went out as the countdown started for the new year.

“10.”

“9.”

“8.”

“7.”

“6.”

“5.”

Electricity ran through Y/N’s vein as she felt a hand brush hers ever so lightly.

“4.”

Y/N looked down, even in the dark Y/N could make out Harry’s tattooed hand and his ringed fingers.

“3.”

“’m sorry,” Harry said his voice was almost like a whisper against the loud counting.

“2.”

“It’s fine,” Y/N replied looking up. Harry, he was almost towering over her. It was dark, no doubt but even in it Y/N could make the outlines of his face and Y/N could see the light glinting almost like a star in his eyes.

“1.”

Y/N didn’t know what happened -maybe it was the Champaign in her system- but it felt as if her hand made its way up to Harry’s cheek on it’s own and pressed itself lightly against him. Y/N was about to kiss him but the lights came back on as she returned to her senses and hurriedly took her hand away from him.

“Happy New Year!” Everyone yelled.

“Happy New Year,” Harry whispered to Y/N as a smirk played on his lips.

Y/N didn’t reply she was just so embarrassed, she couldn’t even look at him even for a brief second. Harry however hadn’t tore his gaze from her. Even when he was greeting people for new year just like Y/N was, he had his gaze fixed on her, making Y/N even more nervous.

For the next ten minutes it was nothing but loud chattering as they could see the fireworks from the huge window that covered one entire wall of the room.

“I think I’ll head home,” Y/N didn’t want to talk to Harry at all -she was too embarrassed for that- but she was about to leave and leaving without a good bye when he was standing next to her just seemed rude.

“Why? Party just started,” Harry replied.

Y/N didn’t know why she wanted to leave, or maybe she did. Y/N just wanted get away from him and just tell herself how stupid she acted while eating ice cream and re-watching some show on Netflix.

He was older, why he’d want to be with a teenager, such as herself. Why would Y/N even think of making a move when it was clearly not possible for them.

Y/ N just wanted to go home.

“I’m not feeling like partying right now.”

Harry chuckled. “I’ll drop you off then.”

“There’s no need,” Y/N quickly said shaking her head. She wanted to get away from him, she obviously didn’t want be alone with him in a car for almost an hour. But there was a part of her which was excited and which just wanted to be alone with him and spend time with him.

“Oh, c'mon, You had too many drinks, you don’t want to spend the first day of new year in jail, now do you?”

“Uh, you had drinks yourself,” Y/N tried to reason.

“One glass can drive,” stated as he tugged on Y/N’s arm to so she’d move.

“Bu-” Y/N tried to protest but Harry cut her.

“No buts,” Harry said pulling her.

“Fine,” Y/N said giving in. It was probably that part of her which just wanted to be with him, that made her give in so easily.

*

The whole car ride was light hearted. Harry made small talks - asking her about her family, congratulating her on her new film, cracking a joke every now and then as different songs played softly from the radio.

Y/N felt comfortable. Even though she had butterflies in her stomach and her heart was still racing, she wasn’t nervous anymore. Y/N almost felt she knew him her whole life, even though she knew it was their first time having a decent conversation. But, Harry, he made her feel home, somehow.

Guess I’ll just stumble on home to my cats

Alone, unless you wanna come along

“Gonna sleep now?” Harry asked as he parked his car in Y/N’s front lawn.

“Um no, probably gonna cuddle my cats and watch TV,” Y/N paused before she said timidly. “Unless you wanna come along.”

“Sure,” Harry’s face broke into a huge grin. It was as if he was almost waiting for Y/N to say those words.

Harry turned off his car’s ignition before Y/N guided him to her house. The rest of the night they watched ‘Legally Blonde’ while snuggling each other with five of Y/N’s cats and eventually falling asleep on each other by morning.

That night was the night when Y/N found her love.
trail.content:
-the one inspired from Gorgeous

Master List

Before You Read: Y/N is famous herself, huge age difference (I didn’t mention their age so you can pretend Y/N’s age whatever but she’s legal), I changed the lyric from Ocean blue eyes to forest green eye - just so it makes sense!

A/N: I have so many request rn but I decided to write something that popped in my mind few days ago. But, I promise I’ll get back to each and everyone who sent in requests and promise I’m not ignoring you guys! Plus as it is inspired by Taylor Swifts’s Gorgeous, I’d recommend you to listen to it while reading it.

The air was filled with the smell of campaign and expensive fragrance. The room was decorated with elegant jewelleries and ornaments. People were dancing and drinking with their friends and their partners. But, Y/N stood there alone, with her own glass of Champaign, wearing an expensive short dress of her own; illuminated under the chandelier above her. Her gaze was fixed at a particular man standing at the far corner of the room talking to few of his friends.

Y/N didn’t know how long she was standing there, looking at him. However, the time she spotted him - she wasn’t tipsy and her elbows and shoulder didn’t hurt for leaning on the bar counter for so long.

Harry, he was so gorgeous. His forest green eyes, his sizzled cheek bones, his defined jaw, his fluffy hair - he was just so gorgeous.

Suddenly, he looked on his left and his eyes fell on her. That was the third time that night she was caught staring. But, that didn’t make her get used to his soft yet stern; light yet steely gaze, nor did it make her look away from him. Y/N waved with confidence, a smile fixed on her face but her knees- they were going weak and her heart- it was beating thousand miles a minute.

Harry waved back just like he did last two times before going back to his conversation. Even from this far Y/N could tell he was confused and even from this far she sensed the little excitement and happiness, he exerted after that.

summary: I know that autumn makes us all a bit lazier and sleepier. we have a little more headache and a little bit (!) more equilibrium...
body:
I know that autumn makes us all a bit lazier and sleepier. we have a little more headache and a little bit (!) more equilibrium is lost when we try to see monsters in the dark. it is absolutely okay. the change of seasons is very difficult for our organisms. need help them. take vitamin complexes, eat fresh vegetables and fruits, dance in the morning with your favorite music in order to wake up faster. and not to worry about trifles (I know it is difficult, but a deep breath, an exhalation and focus on your own, pleasant soul affairs can help to achieve some kind of harmony during periods of particular anxiety). if you feel that you are not able to cope with the flow of affairs, place them in a column depending on the importance: from the top, what is super must be done, and the lower, the less necessary.

Do not forget to look around and pay attention to the beautiful mood of nature. do not panic. you can handle it 🍂
